topic: Генерал, который сжёг Москву, чтобы победить

prompts.image_prompt: A highly detailed retro 16-bit pixel art cutscene, cinematic shot. A weathered, stern catfolk General in early 19th-century Russian military uniform (general's coat, epaulets) stands on a high hill overlooking a massive, sprawling cityscape (Moscow analogue) veiled in a cold, foreboding mist. Limited 16-bit color palette, visible pixels. Dramatic lighting, deep shadows. No text or UI elements.
prompts.video_prompt: Retro 16-bit pixel art, cinematic loop. A weathered catfolk General stands on a hilltop overlooking the misty city below. Slow, subtle camera dolly zoom out combined with a gentle upward tilt, emphasizing the vastness of the city and the General's solitary position. Micro-animations: General's coat subtly billowing in the cold wind, ears twitching, slow, deep breathing/chest rise, distant smoke plumes slowly rising from the city midground, subtle light flicker suggesting distant internal conflict. Looping hero movement: The General slowly clenches and unclenches his gloved paw, a sign of deep internal struggle. No text.
